profile.name: Joydeep Ghosh
profile.bio: "Turning coffee into code, ideas into reality, and bugs into features."
profile.headline: Computer Science Explorer — Cybersecurity | C/C++ | Frontend | Python

sections.about: I’m a Computer Science Explorer with a strong passion for cybersecurity (ethical testing), C/C++, frontend development (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React), Python automation, and game development. I enjoy building and securing systems, learning by doing, and shipping projects that teach.

experience.title: Open-source & Projects
experience.detail: Creator/maintainer of small projects; contributors to tooling and learning projects.

experience.title: Languages & Tools
experience.detail: Proficient in C, C++, Python, JavaScript; familiar with Kali Linux and penetration testing tools.

highlights.title: Current Journey
highlights.detail: Mastering Cybersecurity, building projects in C/C++ & Python, improving frontend skills, and experimenting with game engines.

highlights.title: Popular Repos
highlights.detail: deepxcodings, Tic-Tac-Toe_UI, C-Programings — check my GitHub for code samples and learning projects.
